```python
from vpython import *

# Screen Settings
scene = canvas(width=700, height=400)

# Cyber Input Variable Mapping Information
Height_I = 5

def reset_scene():
    scene.delete()
    scene = canvas(width=700, height=400)
    
    # Parameters
    g = 9.81  # acceleration due to gravity
    v0 = 10  # initial horizontal velocity

    # Initial Height
    initial_height = Height_I

    # Ground
    ground = box(pos=vector(0, -initial_height, 0), size=vector(20, 0.1, 5), color=color.green)

    # Ball
    ball = sphere(pos=vector(-10, 0, 0), radius=1, color=color.red, make_trail=True)

    # Initial Velocity Components
    vx = v0
    vy = 0

    # Time Step
    dt = 0.01

    while ball.pos.y >= -initial_height:
        rate(100)
        
        # Update position
        ball.pos.x += vx * dt
        ball.pos.y += vy * dt
        
        # Update velocity components
        vy -= g * dt
        
        # Bounce off the ground
        if ball.pos.y <= -initial_height:
            vy = -vy

reset_scene()
```
